DEFICE
ATREYAPURAMPage..2..
You are my wife. Therefore, out of the love I have for you, I intend to make you inherit some immovable property. Therefore, in return for this love, I hereby grant you the immovable property valued at Rs. 7,84,000/- (Seven Lakh Eighty-Four Thousand Rupees in words) as per the schedule below and I hereby take possession of the said property to you today itself. From now on, you shall be the permanent and absolute rightful owner of this settlement property, and you shall pay all taxes due to the Sri Nagar Panchayat and shall sell it to the public. You shall enjoy the property of your children and grandchildren for the rest of your life. Whatever disputes may arise regarding this settlement property, whether by any means or by any means, I shall, at my own expense, settle them for you or your heirs, and I shall be able to enforce them for you without interruption according to this settlement. The immovable property as per the schedule below has been the property of my father and has come into my possession with full rights and I have been enjoying the property of the R.C.C. Daba property with the land as per the schedule below, which has not been encroached upon by anyone else, and which is undisputed property, as per the survey. I hereby declare that the land transferred by this deed is free from any other heirs or claimants except me and that there are no trees, gardens, valuable minerals, mines, precious stones such as granite, missionary or fish ponds etc. in the land transferred by this deed. I also declare that I will be liable to prosecution and payment of excise duty if such factual details are found to have been concealed in this document.
Alla GovinduvaluSheet Endorsement

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement deed No 122 of 2026 dated 28/Jan/2026, executed by Illa Govindu in favour of his wife Illa Manga, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 151 Sq.Yds, Near by bearing house number 5-62 , comprised in survey number 180-1 situated in Madiki Village and Grama Panchayat, Alamuru Mandal, within the District of East Godavari registered at sub-registrar office Atreyapuram is bounded as follows: North by: 40.00 Ft R.C.C. house of Reddy Subbarao South by: 40.00 Ft Panchayithi Road East by: 34.00 Ft Panchayithi Road West by: 34.00 Ft R.C.C. house of Koppisetti Satyanarayana

It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or
Lease Deed

Note : It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
